Body:
curve_geometry = an.NurbsCurveGeometry2D(degree=2, nb_poles=5, is_rational=
    False)
curve_geometry.knots = [2, 2, 3, 3, 4, 4]
curve_geometry.poles = [[8.0, 6.0], [6.0, 7.0], [8.0, 8.0], [10.0, 9.0], [
    8.0, 10.0]]
intersections = an.curve_span_intersection(curve_geometry, knots_u=[5, 5, 6,
    7, 8, 9, 10, 10], knots_v=[5, 5, 6, 8, 8, 10, 10], tolerance=1e-07,
    include_curve_knots=False)
assert_array_almost_equal(intersections, [2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4])
